headline: Assessing Procter & Gamble (PG) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Tide Evo Launch
summary: Procter & Gamble (PG) is back in focus after topping fiscal second quarter earnings expectations, drawing analyst upgrades and renewed attention to its mix of new products, including the nationwide launch of Tide evo. See our latest analysis for Procter & Gamble. Those product launches and the earnings beat have coincided with a clear shift in sentiment, with the share price at US$165.17 and a 30 day share price return of 10% feeding into a 5 year total shareholder return of 50.76%. This...

headline: Household Cleaners Market Competitive Landscape Report 2025: Top Companies Analysis, Profiles, Strategic Developments, Mergers, Sustainability Goals, Product Innovations and Launches, Revenues
summary: The global household cleaning products market, valued at USD 41.66 billion in 2025, is projected to reach USD 61.50 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 4.99%. Growth is driven by increasing hygiene awareness, urbanization, and demand for eco-friendly cleaners. Key players like Church & Dwight Co. Inc., Colgate-Palmolive, and Procter & Gamble dominate, emphasizing sustainable packaging and non-toxic formulations.
